Method Detail

simpleCommandLineParser

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> simpleCommandLineParser(java.lang.String[] args)
Simple method which turns an array of command line arguments into a map, where each token starting with a '-' is a key and the following non '-' initial token, if there is one, is the value. For example, '-size 5 -verbose' will produce a map with entries (-size, 5) and (-verbose, null).

printCommandLineOptions

public static void printCommandLineOptions(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
Function to print the command line options.

Parameters:
options -
